content.description: The table below shows regional electricity demands in 2016 and projected demands in 2040.
content.question: Total Electricity Demand (terawatt hours) Region 2016 2040 Africa <math alttext="655" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>655</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="1707" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1707</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> United States <math alttext="3886" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3886</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="4570" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4570</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> China <math alttext="5320" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5320</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="9230" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>9230</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> European Union <math alttext="2857" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2857</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="3178" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3178</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Southeast Asia <math alttext="837" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>837</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="1997" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1997</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Middle East <math alttext="910" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>910</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="1798" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1798</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> India <math alttext="1102" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1102</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="3606" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3606</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Which of the following correctly pairs a region with its percent increase in electricity demand between 2016 and 2040?

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
